column2: As Cultists in cities around the world celebrate, Astronomers and Astrologers both study a phenomenon that occurs only approximately every twenty years.
The Planets Align! As Cultists in cities around the world celebrate, Astronomers and Astrologers both study a phenomenon that occurs only approximately every twenty years.
The Planets Align! Cultists around the world celebrate! Astronomers and Astrologers both study this rare conjunction.
The Planets Align! Cultists around the world celebrate!
The end times approach nigh! The Old Ones are returning!
The end times approach nigh!\n\nDagon is returning from the depths!
The end times approach nigh!\n\nYig is returning from their underground lair!
We have more than we need, we must help the other cults!
Our loyal followers deserve some rewards! We will be taking everything from them soon enough!
We have an excess of money in the government coffers! Maybe we should distribute a small amount to the masses. We will be taking it back from them soon enough!
Cultists around your country are celebrating the conjunction!\n\nThe Cultists seem to believe that it will not be long till they take over $COUNTRY$

A Carnival of excesses!

As Head of government you have been asked to lead the festivities to celebrate the Conjunction.

Something to do with a sacrifice?
Think I'll give it a miss...
